item.title: SmartEvac
item.description: Smart evacuation management. In many schools or office buildings the evacuation plans always generally follow the same structure in each drill. This tool allows for dynamic management of emergencies in the event of a crisis. The plan can adapt to the location of danger within the building and the location of each individual participant.
